DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether administration dietary supplement astaxanthin vitamin E improve quality sperm , fertilization embryo development Assisted Reproduction Techniques ( ART ) procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Astaxanthin Semen Quality , Fertilization Embryo Development Assisted Reproduction Techniques Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: In study male patient diagnose oligoasthenozoospermia - abnormal sperm concentration motility , irrespective morphology spermatozoon - treat female partner assist reproduction technique ( ISCI ) include . In double blind study male patient give astaxanthin vitamin E ( study group , 40 patient ) placebo ( control group , 40 patient ) three month prior ART . In study control group quality sperm ( spermiogram ) , DNA fragmentation mitochondrial membrane potential semen dietary supplementation evaluate . In ART procedure ( ICSI ) fertilization rate , quality embryo , pregnancy rate miscarriages rate 1st trimester compare study control group .
DOC.criteria: oligoasthenozoospermia without teratozoospermia WHO criteria year 2010 fresh semen female partner young 38 year idiopathic tubal infertility female partner least 4 oocyte retrieve previous ovarian punction ART cycle , previously perform 1st , 2nd 3rd cycle ART genetic indication ART procedure donate semen polycystic ovary syndrome female partner dietary supplementation intake antioxidant ( selenium , zink , vitamin E , vitamin C , vitamin A ) male participant last three month smoke male participant > 20 cigarette per day
